languages.text: "Всем в Доме известно, что дитя — хранитель Истинного Атласа Звездных путей, некогда принадлежавшего нашему великому {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатору{/g} — Тисифоне Орселлио. Неблагодарные твари тайно ненавидели светлейшую, а когда... Тисифона сняла с себя полномочия и удалилась в неизвестном направлении, решили устроить переворот и уничтожить ее преемницу".

traits.locale_text: "Всем в Доме известно, что дитя — хранитель Истинного Атласа Звездых путей, некогда принадлежавшего нашему великому {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатору{/g} — Тисифоне Орселлио. Неблагодарные твари тайно ненавидели светлейшую, а когда... Тисифона сняла с себя полномочия и удалилась в неизвестном направлении, решили устроить переворот и уничтожить ее преемницу".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of the one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated Her Grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."
languages.original_text: "Всем в Доме известно, что дитя — хранитель Истинного Атласа Звездных путей, некогда принадлежавшего нашему великому {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатору{/g} — Тисифоне Орселлио. Неблагодарные твари тайно ненавидели светлейшую, а когда... Тисифона сняла с себя полномочия и удалилась в неизвестном направлении, решили устроить переворот и уничтожить ее преемницу".

traits.locale_text: "Everybody in the House knows the child is the keeper of one true Starway Atlas that once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated her grace, and when... Tisiphone withdrew from responsibility and left in an unknown direction, staged a revolt to destroy her successor."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Everybody in the House knows the child is the keeper of one true Starway Atlas that once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated her grace, and when... Tisiphone withdrew from responsibility and left in an unknown direction, staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

The ungrateful wretches secretly hated her grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

traits.locale_text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated her grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

traits.locale_text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of the one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated Her Grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “家族中的每个人都知道，那个孩子是群星圣仪唯一真正的守护者。群星圣仪曾属于我们伟大的{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}提西福涅·奥赛罗，但那群忘恩负义的卑鄙小人却在暗地里憎恨那位大人。当……提西福涅放弃了她的职责，前往不知名的目的地时，那些家伙发动了一场叛乱，打算消灭提西福涅的继承人。”
languages.original_text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of the one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated Her Grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

traits.locale_text: “家族中的每个人都知道，那个孩子是群星圣仪唯一真正的守护者。群星圣仪曾属于我们伟大的{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}提西福涅·奥塞罗，但那群忘恩负义的卑鄙小人却在暗地里憎恨她的恩惠。当……提西福涅放弃了她的职责，前往不知名的目的地时，那些家伙发动了一场叛乱，打算消灭提西福涅的继承人。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Todos en la casa saben que la niña es la custodia del verdadero Atlas de las Vías Estelares, que perteneció a nuestra gran {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. Esos desagradecidos odiaban a su excelencia y cuando Tisiphone... abdicó de sus responsabilidades y se marchó rumbo a lo desconocido, organizaron una revuelta para acabar con su sucesora».
languages.original_text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of the one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated Her Grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

traits.locale_text: «Todos en la casa saben que la niña es la custodia del verdadero Atlas de las Vías Estelares, que perteneció a nuestra gran {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. Esos desagradecidos odiaban a su excelencia y cuando Tisiphone... abdicó de sus responsabilidades y se marchó rumbo a lo desconocido, organizaron una revuelta para acabar con su sucesora».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「かつて偉大なる{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}・ティシフォン・オーセリオが所有していた真のスターウェイ・アトラスの管理者であることは、家の誰もが知っている。恩知らずどもは密かに陛下を憎んでいたのだ。そして…ティシフォンが責任を放棄し 未知の土地へと旅立った今、後継者を潰すために反乱を起こしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of the one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated Her Grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて偉大なる{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}・ティシフォン・オーセリオが所有していた真のスターウェイ・アトラスの管理者であることは、家の誰もが知っている。恩知らずどもは密かに陛下を憎んでいたのだ。そして…ティシフォンが責任を放棄し 未知の土地へと旅立った今、後継者を潰すために反乱を起こしたのだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Alle im Haus wissen, dass das Kind die Hüterin des einzig wahren Atlas der Sternenwege ist, der einst unserer großen {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio gehörte. Die undankbaren Würmer hassten Ihre Gnaden, und als ... Tisiphone abdankte und in unbekannte Gefilde aufbrach, zettelten sie eine Revolte an, um ihre Nachfolgerin zu vernichten."
languages.original_text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of the one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated Her Grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

traits.locale_text: "Alle im Haus wissen, dass das Kind die Hüterin des einzig wahren Atlas der Sternenwege ist, der einst unserer großen {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio gehörte. Die undankbaren Würmer hassten Ihre Gnaden, und als ... Tisiphone abdankte und in unbekannte Gefilde aufbrach, zettelten sie eine Revolte an, um ihre Nachfolgerin zu vernichten."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Dans notre maison, nul n'ignore que cette Enfant est la gardienne du véritable Atlas des étoiles, celui-là même qui appartenait autrefois à la grande {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. Cependant, il est des parasites qui n'ont pas su apprécier la grâce de son règne et... Dès son abdication et son départ pour des régions inconnues, ces misérables ont fomenté une révolte visant à anéantir sa successeure. »
languages.original_text: "Всем в Доме известно, что дитя — хранитель Истинного Атласа Звездных путей, некогда принадлежавшего нашему великому {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатору{/g} — Тисифоне Орселлио. Неблагодарные твари тайно ненавидели светлейшую, а когда... Тисифона сняла с себя полномочия и удалилась в неизвестном направлении, решили устроить переворот и уничтожить ее преемницу".

traits.locale_text: « Dans notre maison, nul n'ignore que cette enfant est la gardienne du véritable Atlas des étoles, celui-là même qui appartenait autrefois à la grande {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. Cependant, il est des parasites qui n'ont pas su apprécier la grâce de son règne et... Dès son abdication et son départ pour des régions inconnues, ces misérables ont fomenté une révolte visant à anéantir sa successeure. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hane'deki herkes bilir ki çocuk, bir zamanlar ulu {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisimiz{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio'ya ait olan tek gerçek Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın koruyucusudur. Kadir kıymet bilmeyen bu alçaklar, efendimizden gizliden gizliye nefret ediyorlardı. Tisiphone'nin sorumluluklarını bir kenara koyup bilinmeyen diyarlara gidişinin ardından da vârisini yok etmek için isyan tertip ettiler."
languages.original_text: "Everyone in the House knows the child is the keeper of the one true Starway Atlas, which once belonged to our great {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g} Tisiphone Orsellio. The ungrateful wretches secretly hated Her Grace, and when... Tisiphone abdicated her responsibilities and set off for parts unknown, they staged a revolt to destroy her successor."

traits.locale_text: "Hane'deki herkes bilir ki çocuk, bir zamanlar ulu {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g}'miz Tisiphone Orsellio'ya ait olan tek gerçek Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın koruyucusudur. Kadir kıymet bilmeyen bu alçaklar Majesteleri'nden gizliden gizliye nefret ediyorlardı ve Tisiphone'nin sorumluluklarını bir kenara koyup bilinmeyen diyarlara gitmesinin ardından vârisini yok etmek için bir isyan tertip ettiler."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
